programme.title: Malarum Uravugal
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yang mencari bapanya selepas dia tidak dapat menghubungi bapanya selama setahun. Sewaktu mencari bapanya, dia dilanggar oleh sebuah kereta yang dipandu seorang lelaki tua bersama isteri.

programme.title: Sudip Pusing Dunia

programme.title: Di Hujung Ranting

programme.title: Resepi VIP Glamor

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 94
programme.desc: (Encore) What the sweeteners and colorings in fruit-flavored sodas do to the body; the women of "The Dish" investigate the bone broth boom: what the health benefits may be and whether the supermarket broths are the real deal; easy hacks to make it at home.

programme.title: Code Of Law S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: The boss of a small start-up is found dead from a blow by a blunt instrument to his head. The investigations point to one of his interns, uncovering a pattern of workplace abuse … and a long buried secret. Guest starring Rebecca Lim.

programme.title: The Simpsons 29 - EP 20
programme.desc: The Simpsons go to Denmark so Grampa can benefit from its free healthcare system.

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud - Funniest Ever - EP 2
programme.desc: As its name suggests, the 6-part compilation series Funniest Ever LOLs takes the best moments from across all four series of Make You Laugh Out Loud.

programme.title: Divided (US) - EP 15
programme.desc: Each episode consists of four contestants playing as one team who must agree on answers to questions they are given. The longer it takes the team to come to an agreement, the less money the team earns for each question.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 13
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 56
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Victoria Beckham (Victoria Beckham Beauty) and they play an extra spicy version of "Ellen's Burning Questions".

programme.title: Nature Cat S1 - EP 53
programme.desc: Nature Cat can't wait to get outside for a day of backyard nature excursions and bravery with friends! But there's 1 problem, he's still a house cat with no real instincts for nature. That doesn't stop this passionate and curious feline, who loves learning and experiencing all he can about nature.

programme.title: Rusty Knight - EP 43
programme.desc: In Scrapland, the characters have all been put together from various recycled household utensils. They devote their unique talents to getting ex-cash register Knight Rusty out of trouble, who thinks he's the bravest, coolest knight in all of Scrapland (but he's really a show-off with a big mouth).

programme.title: Dot - EP 3
programme.desc: Dot is an 8-year old inquisitive and exuberant tech-savvy girl who launches herself into adventures and fearlessly sets about solving problems by making mistakes and laughing even more along the way.

programme.title: Puppy Dog Pals Yr 1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Fun-loving pug puppies Bingo and Rolly go on exhilarating adventures in their neighborhood and around the globe.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and the stakes are sky high, Rusty and best buds Ruby and Botasaur invent and innovate their way out of every jam by repurposing spare parts and found objects into the most awesome contraptions ever!

programme.title: Tobot S4 - EP 5
programme.desc: More adventures from "Tobots", cars that transform into robots to fight crime and protect their neighbourhood.

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots S4 - EP 5

programme.desc: (R) Rui Xin is unhappy with Lan Ying and Zi Jun, so she leaves home to stay with Man Rong. Zi Jun's good friend Li Qun persuades Zi Jun to give in, and Zi Jun relents. At work, Man Rong oppresses Zi Jun, and her marketing proposal is well-liked by their boss. Zi Jun feels defeated. (PG)(重)锐心对岚英和子骏不满，离家出走，入住曼蓉家。子骏怒责曼蓉教唆锐心离家出走，要锐心马上跟他回去，锐心拒绝，双方僵持不下。好友立群劝子骏让步，子骏只好妥协。工作上，曼蓉趁机打压子骏，提出的宣传方案被老板娘接受，子骏感受挫。.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 23
programme.desc: Si Jin's mother, Bao Ling, returns from overseas and advises Jin Quan to stop objecting Kai Wei and Si Jin from being together, revealing his selfish motives for doing so. Jin Quan is worried that Si Jin, who has no blood relations with him would throw him aside. Si Jin is shocked to overhear Jin Quan's conversation with Bao Ling. (PG)思今的母亲宝玲刚从外国回来，劝锦泉不要反对凯威和思今在一起，并揭穿锦泉一再反对他们两人是因为存有私心，担心和他没有血缘关系的思今会丢下他不管，这番话正好被思今听见，感到很震惊。.

programme.desc: "Garden Of Treasure " is a documentary on the healing functions and botanical characteristics of wild flowers and herbs which can also be used to cook simple and delicious flower dishes. 《寻花探草》是以药草拍摄为主的纪录片，介绍他们心目中的百搭花草，逐一分享花草的药疗功能和植物特性, 也化成一道道简单好味的花草料理。.

programme.title: 最佳利益 Best Interest - EP 2
programme.desc: Bo Yun was accepted by Chang He Firm . Feng Zheng decide to let Bo Yun warm the bench for five months under her guidance . Bo Yun received a call from Jian Xing who was arrested for murder . Meanwhile Jian Xing has to attend the marathon selection meeting the next afternoon . (PG-些许暴力画面)博昀意外接到录取通知，方筝在不得不担任指导律师的状况下，打定主意让博昀坐五个月的冷板凳。博昀接到学弟健行的求救电话，健行因涉嫌杀人被逮捕！健行隔天下午必须出席代表马拉松大赛的选拔会!

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Zilong accomplishes his mission by delivering the two legendary swords to Situ Wangyun. Xiahou Qingyi tells Zilong that she does not love Gao Ze, though she is betrothed. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赵子龙不负所托，将两把护国神剑交给司徒王允。夏侯轻衣告诉子龙，虽然她与高则订有婚约，不过她并不爱他。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 2 Say It! Sr 2 - EP 7

How are they going to deal with troublesome customers such as those who want to eat durian but are afraid of bad breath? Also, get to gain durian-related knowledge and have a peek at the durian mooncake production process! (重)这一集，葛米星和恩来成了榴梿摊的助手！面对爱讨价还价的顾客、讲究味道和口感的顾客、想要了解榴梿营养价值的孕妇、要吃榴梿又怕上火口臭的帅哥，他们如何是好？与此同时，他们也会教大家怎么选好吃的榴梿、榴梿的重量有何玄机等知识。大家还可以一窥榴梿月饼的制作过程！《好好说 慢慢讲》榴梿专辑绝对让你"榴梿忘返"！.

Rui Xin is very sad and she bursts into tears. Man Rong criticises Zi Jun for not knowing about his daughter's allergy, and he feels guilty about it. (PG)(重)子骏买了锐心偶像的演唱会门票，以此改善父女关系，劝她回家。锐心对演唱会充满期待，岂料子骏不知她对乳制品敏感，让她喝下含有牛奶的饮料，害得她必须住院，无法去看演唱会。锐心伤心痛哭。曼蓉怒责子骏竟然不知女儿有敏感症，子骏内疚不已。.

(PG)(重)偶像明星Ray和女管家燕美的姐弟恋曝光。面对大众的闲言闲语，燕美倍感压力，所以提出分手。Ray恳求，希望他们俩至少可以把原本计划好的十周年晚餐吃完。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)作斗被胜珠问起真名，思考了好一会儿，决定要坦承以告时，胜珠却睡着了。发现胜珠已婚后，艾瑞克试图忘记她但似乎没有成功。同时，胜珠母亲用尽一切方法想分开胜珠和作斗。.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. (重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 1
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and English) Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans Of The Earth - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The host and the filming team travel across the world's seven continents to bring close-up scenes of endangered species'survival difficulties to the audience. (重)主持人和拍摄团队走遍世界七大洲实地取景, 让观众近距离观察濒危物种的生存困境。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 Hello Taiwan - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This programme introduces to viewers Taiwan's traditional cuisine and its unique ingredient and spices. (重)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 新生之旅 Rites Of Motherhood - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) In the pilot episode, Charlyn Lin visits the Muslim women in Malaysia to learn about the Muslim customs and traditions in childbirth. From the moment a Muslim baby is born, Muslim mothers must adhere to a series of Islamic practices. (重)在马来西亚，翠芳拜访了数名虔诚的马来回教徒，从旁观察她们如何以回教传统的使命迎接小宝宝的诞生。从孩子诞生的那一刻，到第21天做的剃发礼，在她们坐月子期间，马来妇女们都得严守回教礼仪，每个礼节都不马虎。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 59
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yalan plays the damsel in distress and leads Zhengji to believe that Wu Chun has been bullying Yalan. Zhengji thus suggests that Wu Chun goes overseas to reduce the friction between them. The saddened Wu Chun pays Meida a visit but gets scolded by Meida instead. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雅兰一直在正基面前扮可怜，令正基以为吴春自私自利，欺负雅兰，建议吴春到外国留学以减少两人之间的摩擦。吴春觉得委屈，买了美食去找美达，却还被美达嫌弃，令吴春更加难过。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 60
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Wu Chun moves out of Juxi's house. She rents a shabby unit and finds herself a job at an eating house. Yalan finds out about Wu Chun's whereabouts accidentally. She orders Wu Chun to go to France in an attempt to place Wu Chun far away from the rest of the family. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春租下顶楼加盖的房子，并找了一份餐厅的工作。雅兰发现吴春在餐厅工作，送外卖时还差点儿被车撞。雅兰为了让吴春离家人远一点，硬把前往法国的机票塞给吴春。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 5
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Li Ying is bored in the palace and wants to take Lewen out for fun. Lewen takes it that Li Ying is playing a trick on her so she refuses firmly. Li Ying is at a loss. Lewen gets assigned to help at Jin Yinsheng's painting department. Jin Yinsheng takes Lewen to the market place. Lewen stares blankly at ladies' clothing and recalls her mother forbidding her to wear girls' clothing when she was young... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)李旲在宫里很闷，要带乐温出宫玩耍，却被乐温误会是要戏弄她的手段，坚决拒绝，让李旲很无奈。乐温被派到金胤圣的图画署帮忙。金胤圣带乐温去市集，乐温对着女子的衣服发呆，想起小时候母亲不允许自己穿女装的情景。。。。。。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 6
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Lewen covers her nose with a piece of cloth while cleaning the library. When Li Ying sees her appearing like this, he recalls of the masked lady dancers. Lewen asks Li Ying whether she can take leave from the palace for the Mid-Autumn Festival. Li Ying wants to grant her leave initially but eventually rejects her when he discovers that she is running a fever... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)乐温在书库打扫时，被灰尘弄得打喷嚏，不自觉地用布遮住鼻子，被李旲看到她只露出眼睛的样子，想起蒙面跳舞的女子。乐温问李旲中秋节是不是可以放假出宫，李旲本想放她出宫去看风灯节，但发现她已经感冒发烧，便恶声恶气地禁止她出门。。。。。。.

programme.desc: (R) Prices of bananas are on the rise, but who are really benefitting? Lennard travels to find out how food fads, farm fires, and deadly diseases are costing us our daily serving of fruit. (重)主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) In Tokyo, making a living is an uphill battle from young to old. An elderly barber runs a failing business with his wife, by curbing expenses to meagre $12 a day. A freelance street performer decided to pursue an alternative career after graduation but now with marriage on the cards, he worries about his future. And for a young single mother, her divorce left her stigmatised and when she finally found a job, her income is still insufficient to support her child's education cost. (重)曾经日赚1000新元的理发师，为什么沦为‘下流老人'，一日花费仅限12新元？拒绝成为主流白领，41岁街头表演艺人结婚成问题。30岁养老院护理员服务于日本最具潜力的行业，却存不了孩子未来的教育费。看高龄少子化问题如何冲击日本社会。.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places of ultimate experience and showcase places of interest and culture. Countries covered are Russia, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, etc. In this episode, the host will bring viewers to tour Kyrgyz. (重)这系列的旅游节目将带观众到异国风情的地方，享受终极的体验，参观名胜古迹。 覆盖的国家是俄罗斯，乌兹别克斯坦，哈萨克斯坦等。在这一集，主持人将带观众游览吉尔吉斯。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 61
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Teacher Kim is amazed by the wine that Wu Chun has brewed and recommends Juxi to introduce the wine to the public. The jealous Yalan adds additives to the wine, causing Pung Gil Dang to be caught in a controversy. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)金老师尝了吴春酿制的白首环童酒，觉得味道出奇地好，建议菊熙发表该酒。雅兰眼红，故意对酒钢里的酒动手脚。专家们在发表会上一喝就发现酒加入了添加剂。丰吉堂颜面扫地。金老师知道是雅兰搞鬼，想告诉菊熙真相，却被雅兰阻止。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 62
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yalan attempts to bribe Teacher Kim to keep quiet about the additives incident, but indirectly causes Teacher Kim to fall into a lake instead. Desperate to keep the matter under wraps, Yalan does not call for help. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雅兰想用钱收买金老师，在拉扯中，金老师不慎落水。雅兰为了自保，没有拨电寻求帮助。雅兰担心自己在复原酒内加入添加剂的事被拆穿，于是故意把添加剂安置在工作室里，利用金老师帮她顶罪。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 7
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yinsheng feels jealous when he sees Lewen and Li Ying having fun releasing hot air lanterns together. Lewen finds out that Li Ying made a wish for her to reunite with her mother. She asks Li Ying how he knows she has been separated from her mother. Li Ying says Lewen reminds him of the mysterious lady dancer which causes Lewen to panic... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)胤圣看到乐温与李旲在街上一起开心地放风灯，有点吃醋。乐温看到李旲的风灯上写的是希望洪乐温找到自己的母亲。连忙问李旲怎么知道自己与妈妈分开的事。李旲亦通过风灯，跟乐温说她让他再次想起那神秘的舞女。让乐温十分恐慌。。。。。。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 8
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Jinxian asks Zhao Wanheng out for fishing and proposes marriage for their children. When Xiayan visits the princess, she finds out that the crown prince will go to the garden so she staged a chance encounter with the crown prince. The two have an enjoyable conversation. Lewen feels a sense of loss when she sees this... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)金宪约赵万衡钓鱼并向他提出了结为亲家的请求。霞妍去探访公主时，得知世子会去花园后，便假装在花园与世子偶遇，两人相谈甚欢；正巧被乐温撞见了这一幕，内心顿时感到有些许失落。。。。。。。.

programme.title: 声入人心 Super Vocal - EP 3
programme.desc: "Super Vocal" is a singing competition focused on classically trained singers, singing both operatic and musical pieces. It features 36 male singers, with six winners after a total of 100 days. programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.desc: Armed conflict in the Donbass region of Ukraine has forced Eastern Ukrainian youth to leave their homes. Without a mean of living, with no shelter from weather elements, no social handouts, they become drug addicts and are infected with HIV. With the mercilessly cold winter approaching fast, there is also a danger of infecting Tuberculosis. 乌克兰发生内战，东部战区青年逃离家园。没有工作，没有庇护所，也没有社会救济，他们染上毒瘾，甚至感染艾滋病毒。漫漫冬天来临，除了得面对刺骨寒冬，还可能染上肺结核。迷失的乌克兰青年，要如何摆脱悲剧的宿命？.

programme.title: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: In this episode, Chef Bob will be introducing a new recipe and our physical trainer will show us some yoga movements that can improve your mobility. Also not to be missed, Khairudin Samsudin advising his banter buddy, Suhaimi Yusof, on doctor's visit protocol during this trying period.

programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 6
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. KARMA is a twisted, ironic story, about an old-fashioned, bitter spinster who 'trades' her unappealing character after she fell for a younger, rugged, happy-go-lucky bachelor. Karmaliah, in her late 30s; rose successfully in her career in sales through office politics and unscrupulous means. Her detestable character and bad fashion sense added to her inability to catch the attention of any potential suitor. Nobody dares to confront Karmaliah about her repulsive character until Johari, a new colleague, tells her off. Gradually she falls in love with Johari and starts to change her ways. But her past catches up on her. Johari meets an accident and receives an organ transplant from an ex-colleague whom Karmaliah used to betray. Johari loses his memory and ditches Karmaliah.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 4
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. Hazri was heartbroken when he found out that his long-time girlfriend Farhana is already engage. Farhana had no choice but to abide to her mother's wishes .Though disappointed, Hazri vows to prove Farhana that she had made the wrong choice in her life.

programme.title: Kerana Kasih
programme.desc: What would life be if your mother is psychologically incapacitated? What would you do if you learnt why she is so different from other mothers is because she has autism, a lifelong development disability? Does having disability change the effect on how much a mother loves her child? Does being a normal person make you a competent mother than those with disabilities?Kerana Kasih is the second story of #KasihTrilogy the trilogy telemovies of a mothers love (kasih). It is a story about how an autistic mother who has to go through the legal and emotional struggles to retain the custody of her daughter just because of a --- selfish motive.

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 19
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible. For love, friendship and trust that was given to Zikri and Dhia, Emillia felt betrayed for what they did to her. Dhia blames herself and seek forgiveness from Emillia. But things took a turn, when Emillia discovers the truth in Dhia secret diary.

programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 6
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. KARMA is a twisted, ironic story, about an old-fashioned, bitter spinster who 'trades' her unappealing character after she fell for a younger, rugged, happy-go-lucky bachelor. Karmaliah, in her late 30s; rose successfully in her career in sales through office politics and unscrupulous means. Her detestable character and bad fashion sense added to her inability to catch the attention of any potential suitor. Nobody dares to confront Karmaliah about her repulsive character until Johari, a new colleague, tells her off. Gradually she falls in love with Johari and starts to change her ways. But her past catches up on her. Johari meets an accident and receives an organ transplant from an ex-colleague whom Karmaliah used to betray. Johari loses his memory and ditches Karmaliah.

programme.title: Cantik Detektif - EP 2
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Gorgeous radiant skin, long silky hair and youthful looks make us envy everything about Thai women. But how is it that they are able to defy time even in their advancing years? Host Huda Ali investigates Thailand's novel beauty secrets that have been passed down from generation to generation. From a 16th century Thai tradition of Hermit Contortion that promises longevity to the 5000 year old 'Tok Sen' (hammer massage) that is said to have the same benefits of acupuncture but without the needles, Huda tries them all to find out the truth behind the claims.

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Finland - EP 4
programme.desc: Turku is located on the southwest coast of Finland and was the first capital of Finland from 1802 to 1812. Till to date, the city still holds its charm and is an important business and cultural center in Northern Europe. The 80s and the 90s of the last century saw a surge in the Muslim Diaspora population in the ancient city.We will share Ramadan experience at Turku City Centre Mosque with the multi-racial communities from the middle east and Africa on how they blend in with the Finnish cult Salam Ramadan - FINLAND will showcase the unique beauty of Finnish landscape with its exotic fauna and flora, against which we will experience the colorful ethnic cultures of different races and how the local Muslims has integrated and adapted their Islamic cultures into the rich tapestry of Finnish people.Besides sharing the holy month experience with fellow Muslims around the world, Salam Ramadan - FINLAND series also hope to encourage Muslim tourism for future.

programme.title: Bantal Buruk Saloma - EP 4
programme.desc: BANTAL BURUK SALOMA is a social drama about foster parenting that centres around family, life, love and forming relationships that lasts a lifetime. But it comes with serious challenges, especially when Aidilfitri approaches. Aidilfitri is a happy time for most kids. But for kids in orphanage or foster care, it is not easy. Some miss their parents. Suraya is sad and feels a little lost after hearing Rafi's mother accuse her of being a bad parent. Saloma sees this and slowly, she learns about Alyssa, Suraya's deceased daughter. Through this revelation, Saloma and Suraya connect because they are both missing someone. One night, in preparation for Aidilfitri, Suraya makes Bantal Peluk Saloma and Saloma begins to take interest in it and joins Suraya. This activity eventually connects them. Suraya teases Saloma, saying that her ‘Bantal Peluk Saloma’ looks wonky and calls it ‘Bantal Buruk Saloma’ instead. Meanwhile, Adil, who has been mistreating Lutfi, begins to change when he sees how kind Lutfi is. However, as the two of them begin to bond, Lutfi's health takes a turn for the worse and he is rushed to hospital….

programme.desc: Nicknamed "Land Below The Wind" Sabah is the state that lies below the typhoon belt of East Asia and is not battered by any typhoons. He instigated Tasriq to hate Sofiya. Then one day, Umi Khatijah is shocked when she heard Sofiya missing while swimming in the river. Kifli found Sofiya while fishing and brought her home. He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Tashriq follows Della to the night club. Riena apologizes to Alysa and sits beside her mother who is still in coma after she falls from the staircase. Kiah wakes from coma and seek forgiveness to everyone. Later the family go meet Alysa’s mother to discuss about Tashriq marry to Alysa. They visit Sofiya’s grave.

programme.title: Hak Siapa - EP 1
programme.desc: Syariah law in Singapore today helps to resolve cases, covering different aspects of marriage, divorces, ancillary matters, custody and inheritance for the Muslim community. However, many will instead relate the Syariah law and court as messy, complex, complicated and emotionally draining; a long and tedious process that may impact the children. And because the issues discussed are sensitive, many tend to shy away from sharing their understanding or misunderstanding of the court and its process.

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 4
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her.

programme.title: Juang Di Rantauan - EP 5
programme.desc: Host: Dalina JaaparShiyan works as a chambermaid in a serviced apartment where she has to clean rooms daily. It is physically demanding but she remains upbeat, the thought of her providing a better future for her children keeps her positive. With her supervisor permitting her to return to Shandong, Shiyan is thrilled to be able to spend time with her children.

programme.title: Mek Gyver - EP 11
programme.desc: Zara is a woman who enjoys doing repairs and will go out of the way to help others whenever they need something repaired - from pipes and computers to cars and farm machinery. Her good friend Aizul runs a repair service and persuades her to work with him. Zara agrees to Aizul's request to earn extra pocket money and to earn money to save a surau. When Izlan opens the same business and asks Zara to join him, she refuses and so the fight begin. Zarra feel dejected when her good friend Jenab express her interest in Aris.She asks Zarra to help her grab Aris's attention so that she can come close to him. Though hesitant, she reluctantly tries to help her.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 6
programme.desc: Tok Ma gets worried when Nawal accidently blurts outs that she is unable to conceive. Masitah decides to stay with Nawal and Hanan for a few days, sending both Hanan and Nawal into a frenzy as they prepare for her arrival.

programme.title: O.M.G 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: When Olivia, Murni and Gina realized they have swopped bodies after conducting an experiment, they are forced to live one anothers life but overtime they learnt about empathy and helped one another with their problems. In the meantime, they are frantically searching for the antidote...

programme.title: Ian King Live
programme.desc: In the this daily business show, Ian King tackles the biggest business and economics stories live from Sky's studios in the heart of the City of London.

programme.title: Heavy Lines and Desert Drops
programme.desc: Learn about the renegades who changed the course of mountain biking, redefining what's possible on two wheels. The stratospheric progression of freeride mountain biking at Red Bull Rampage redefines the upper limits of what is possible on a bike every year. The sport's best riders talk about the most memorable moments from the event's history.

programme.title: The Father
programme.desc: Adventurer. Engineer. Father. Chris Davenport has to balance a life on the edge with a life raising kids. Is it possible to be pro skier and a dad? Some of the most demanding aspects of fatherhood are only compounded by Chris Davenport’s profession and the dangers associated with it. See how Chris makes it all work and how his family feels about it.

programme.title: Windsurfing Jaws
programme.desc: Australian windsurfing legend Jason Polakow has an obsession: the infamous Hawaiian break known as Jaws. Australian windsurfing legend Jason Polakow had been searching for the biggest, gnarliest waves – until he found Jaws. Polakow explores how the infamous Hawaiian break has shaped his life and become his sole obsession for the past 20 years.

programme.title: Hard Lovin' Woman
programme.desc: This hard-hitting rock documentary shows the never-been-told story of Oscar-nominated actress Juliette Lewis. This hard-hitting documentary mixes live performance footage with revealing behind-the-scenes interviews to capture the raw energy and passion of Oscar-nominated actress Juliette Lewis and her hard rock band The Licks as they embark on a world tour.

programme.title: The next generation
programme.desc: Can world champion Antonio Cairoli win a 10th title before he's overtaken by the next generation of riders? Nine-time world champion Antonio Cairoli is one of the top MX riders of his generation, but several up-and-coming riders are poised to make it big. Can Tony win a 10th title before he's overtaken?

programme.title: Motocross of Nations has arrived
programme.desc: Motocross of Nations is an event where the top American and European riders compete against each other. Top American and European riders compete at Motocross of Nations. The sandy track of the Netherlands' Assen TT Circuit gives the Europeans an advantage, but will it be enough to give them the victory?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton rolls the dice on his season by choosing to explore a wave with huge potential. Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton risks his whole season on an unexplored piece of the Atlantic that could hold the biggest wave to ever be ridden. He travels to the middle of the ocean looking for the next big swell, but the ocean offers no guarantees.

programme.title: Exploring Rio
programme.desc: Get a taste of the diverse action and adventure on offer in the neighbourhoods of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, is an incredibly diverse city, filled with action and adventure. From climbing and ultrarunning to downhill mountain biking and surfing, what ties the city together is a love of sport and a deep sense of community.

programme.title: Race the Face
programme.sub-title: A giant slalom race in the Swiss Alps
programme.desc: Jérémie Heitz challenges Daron Rahlves for a head-to-head giant slalom race in big mountain terrain. One of the most accomplished freeriders and a former alpine skier, Jérémie Heitz, challenges Daron Rahlves for a head-to-head giant slalom race in big mountain terrain.

programme.title: Onbashira
programme.desc: An ancient celebration that brings renewed spiritual protection to Shinto temples is also a way of life. This religious festival has been celebrated for 1,200 years, making it the oldest in Japan. Trees weighing as much as 9,000kg are brought from the mountains of Suwa to Shinto temples in a two-month celebration of unity, but it's not without danger.

programme.title: Frames of Mind
programme.sub-title: Inside the process with Matt Jones
programme.desc: Get a glimpse into how Matt Jones visualises every detail of a trick before he puts it into action. Freerider Matt Jones visualises every detail of a trick before he puts it into action. Get a glimpse into what he sees when imagining these tricks as he shreds down the mountain with style.

programme.title: Rainbow Dive
programme.desc: Rhiannan Iffland journeys to the Australian Outback and uncovers more than she expected. World champion cliff diver Rhiannan Iffland journeys to the Australian Outback to rediscover her sense of self and love for diving and in the process uncovers a whole lot more than she bargained for.

programme.title: San Francisco: Future music
programme.desc: In San Francisco, EDM blends technology and art for artists like DJ Chuckie, Hardkiss and The M Machine. DJ Tommie Sunshine explores the symbiosis between EDM and technology in San Francisco, with artists such as DJ Chuckie, Hardkiss and The M Machine seamlessly weaving tech into their work.

programme.title: Time Waits for No One
programme.desc: As the UCI DH MTB World Cup season approaches, the time for talk is over. Riding fast is all that matters now. With the UCI DH MTB World Cup season fast approaching, the top riders in both the men’s and women’s divisions get ready to prove that their off seasons were well spent. The time for talk is over. Riding fast is all that matters now.

programme.title: Plot Twist
programme.desc: In downhill mountain bike racing, the only certainty is that nothing is certain until the last rider's run. With the 2017 season kicking off in Lourdes, France, expectations are running high. But in DH mountain biking, the only certainty is that anything can happen. For Loïc Bruni and the rest of the sport's elite, this means taking nothing for granted.

programme.title: Let's Go over the Bars
programme.desc: Coming into the race in Fort William, Scotland, it's time to look at what makes (and breaks) winning streaks. Fort William, Scotland, has been hosting DH World Cup events since 2002, and the long track always makes for electrifying racing. Leading up to the race in 2017, it's key to examine the factors that can make (and break) a winning streak.

programme.title: Wreck or Get Rekt
programme.sub-title: A battle between video game rivals
programme.desc: A couple of video game rivals get ready to face off in a head-to-head match. Two video game rivals prepare to face off in a riveting head-to-head matchup. This exciting film merges the thrill of watching professional sports with the worldwide phenomenon of video games.

programme.title: Travailen
programme.desc: Trailblazers Ryan Sandes and Ryno Griesel embarked on the ultimate Drakensberg adventure. At midnight on Monday, March 24, 2014, trailblazers Ryan Sandes and Ryno Griesel embarked on the ultimate Drakensberg adventure – the Drakensberg Grand Traverse – in an attempt to break the current record of 60h 29m.

programme.title: Backcountry Powder Lines
programme.desc: New Zealand snowboarders Jake Koia and Roland Morely-Brown take a dream trip to Haines, Alaska to snowboard. New Zealand's backcountry megastar Jake Koia is joined by Roland Morely-Brown on a journey to Haines, Alaska in search of perfect backcountry to ride. Luck is on their side, as they find perfect riding conditions on their first day out.

programme.title: Heli Runs and Shooting Guns
programme.desc: Jake and Roland are blessed with a perfect day for snowboarding... and shooting guns with locals. Snowboarders Jake Koia and Roland Morley-Brown gear up for another epic bluebird day in Alaska's backcountry. After shredding some huge, picturesque lines, they decide the best way to follow that up is to shoot some high-powered guns with the locals.
